subject: Gate 5 Integration: /worker
description:
Phase 3: /worker 스킬에 pre-execution gate 통합

Gate 5 (/worker start):
- Task 시작 전 pre_execution_gate() 호출
- blockedBy 완료 여부 검증
- Target file 접근 권한 검증
- 실패 시 worker blocked 상태로 전환

Target Files:
- .claude/skills/worker/SKILL.md (modify)
- .claude/hooks/worker-preflight.sh (create)

Reference: .claude/skills/shared/validation-gates.sh
